title: Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse; PS/2 and USB; 300 DPI; colors: red, gray, white
descriptions: Introducing the all-new Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse. This exceptional input device is perfect for your computer needs. Featuring a trackball with side-to-side scrolling, it offers precise and ergonomic control for extended periods. With a maximum DPI of 300 and available in red, gray, and white, it combines functionality with style. Measuring 7 inches in length, 2.5 inches in height, and 4 inches in width, this wired mouse has PS/2 and USB connectivity, ensuring compatibility with most computers. Designed for both left and right-handed users, it provides convenience for everyone. Made in China, this reliable and efficient mouse is a must-have.
